sentences.en: A firecracker factory caught fire and was burned down.
sentences.cn: 爆竹工厂著火且烧毁了.

sentences.en: As we came in the second time, Kasokola was ready, and we put the first firecracker straight into the campfire.
sentences.cn: 我们再次飞回来时，卡索科拉已经准备好了。 我们第一发爆竹炸弹径直射进了篝火中。

sentences.en: I played firecracker but I hurt my finger with the fire.
sentences.cn: 在我玩爆竹的时候，伤着了我的手指。

sentences.en: I'm careless to kindle the firecracker, so I'm very unlucky.
sentences.cn: 我很不小心地点燃了鞭炮, 所以我非常的不幸.

sentences.en: Light a firecracker with a burning joss stick.
Only last Saturday my Joe busted a firecracker right under my nose.
sentences.cn: 就在上星期六,我的乔在我面前放了个炮竹.

sentences.en: Organizers of this celebration lit up an eight - mile - long firecracker chain.
sentences.cn: 这次庆典的组织者点燃了一条长8米的鞭炮.

sentences.en: Pattern: Firecracker, folk toy, the fish or the children embrace the carp.
sentences.cn: 图案: 爆竹 、 民间玩具, 鱼或儿童抱鲤鱼.

sentences.en: Pink willow green, the hawk song, firecracker fireworks welcomes the prosperous times.
sentences.cn: 桃红柳绿, 燕舞莺歌, 爆竹烟花迎盛世.

sentences.en: Red firecracker chaff left behind after store-opening celebrations attests to the optimism of many investors.
sentences.cn: 市场开张庆典后的爆竹残渣,足以印证多数投资者的乐观情绪.

sentences.en: Suddenly, a firecracker went off nearby - the signal to start the demonstration.
sentences.cn: 突然, 不远处响起了一声爆竹.这是信号!

sentences.en: The boy touched off a firecracker.
The boy touched off the firecracker and ran away.
sentences.cn: 那男孩点燃了爆竹就跑开了.

sentences.en: The firecracker spattered sparks the moment it was lit.
sentences.cn: 花炮点着后,刺刺地直冒火星.

sentences.en: The firecracker went off with a bang.
When blue flame shines , a happy ground put Li Changjin firecracker.
sentences.cn: 当蓝色火苗亮起来时,李长金一家兴奋地放起了鞭炮.

trans.tran_en: a small  firework  that explodes loudly
